title: Publish the current draft version to production

requirements.text: Publish (deploy) the current draft build to the production site so that the live site reflects the latest draft version.
acceptanceCriteria: The production (live) site is updated to the most recent draft build.
After deployment completes, visiting the production site shows the same behavior/content as the latest draft.

constraints: This request is an operational deploy/publish action; do not introduce product feature changes unless required to complete the publish step.
nonGoals: Adding new app features unrelated to publishing/deployment.
Changing backend authorization, storage, or image behavior as part of this request.
